post.body: that will due

i can bake, but really excel at eating
if someone else says it, that is different, but saying it yourself is just silly
well google says you are, so you must be!
go affiliate , choose products associated with your content that you would actually push
was it red wine? red wine is the great focus zapper .. for me a good red blend will destroy all focus

you can be my enforcer north of the border , a sub contractor of sorts
counter point! haha

um, you get to hang out with me, thats pay enough

ha, no one can keep me from working .. im a machine

I am a CAKE guru and expert ... actually I am a Guru of all Baked Good Eating and an Expert in Baked Good Consumption
if you put "expert" or "guru" somewhere in your own bio, you should get kicked in the teeth ... who are you to call yourself an expert
